description:

title: failed to start VM on disabled port_security_enabled network

to start a VM on port_security_enabled disabled network, it failed:
016-12-21 17:36:01.533 7 ERROR nova.compute.manager [req-ee15cc56-ef1d-4e25-889d-4634804fae57 ff5a300a13f846a08f47c08a3b14f162 3d0d66439f3640c790099997c0ea842f - - -] Instance failed network setup after 1 attempt(s)

comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~gongysh

comments.content:
the reason is that the security group is changed from name into id so that the code failed to exclude:
https://github.com/openstack/nova/blob/master/nova/network/neutronv2/api.py#L589
    def _clean_security_groups(self, security_groups):
        """Cleans security groups requested from Nova API
        Neutron already passes a 'default' security group when
        creating ports so it's not necessary to specify it to the
        request.
        """
        if security_groups == [DEFAULT_SECGROUP]:
            security_groups = []
        return security_groups
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~gongysh
